clients.title: Get Reviews on the Justia Lawyer Directory
description: Did you know your Justia Lawyer Directory profile includes tools that let you request testimonials from your clients or other attorneys? When editing your profile, you may find both tools on the left hand menu - just look for "Request Client Reviews" and "Request Lawyer Reviews" to send your invites by email.
